                         Business Development Manager Job at Khenpro Global Services 



 
        
    

        
         Khenpro Global Services is a human capital organization based in Lagos, Nigeria. We provide human resources services to various clients in different sectors. Our Recruitment and Outsourcing Services have helped improve the efficiency and effectiveness of our clients' service delivery. Our main focus is to enhance client organizations by providing quality services on various aspects of their human resources, allowing the organization to focus on its core issues. 

 We are recruiting to fill the position below: 
 
 Job Position: Business Development Manager  

  Job Location:  Victoria Island, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time 

  Summary 
      

          
  
 
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
     
      

 

 
	 We are seeking a Business Development Manager to join ourteam, a group dedicated to shaping the future with the use of advanced engineering technology to develop the most sophisticated quality driven solution to businesses. 
	 In this role, you will collaborate withkey stakeholders to gather market insights, definerequirements, and drive business strategies that accelerate the adoption of solutions across various industries. 
 

  Job Responsibilities  
Primary Responsibilities: 

 
	 Business Development – Identify and cultivate new sales opportunities, assessing market fit for existing and future advanced engineering technologies. 
	 Market Intelligence – Work closely with the teamto gather and analyze market data, providing insights that inform strategic go-to-market decisions. 
 

 Additional Responsibilities: 

 
	 Customer Project Management – Oversee key customer projects, ensuring seamless coordination of engineering support and tracking hours worked. 
	 Technology Management Support – Assist Managers in driving innovation and business growt 
	 This is a high-impact role suited for a proactive and strategic thinker with a strong ability to navigate complex markets and drive business growth in the fast-evolving field of engineering technologies 
 

  Background & Skills  
We are looking for a business-driven professional with a passion for innovation, to be successful in this role, you should have: 

 
	 A Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Engineering, Business, or a related field. 
	 5 - 7 years of experience in business development, product/technologymanagement—ideally within the engineering technology, oil and gas, ICT, industrial automation, or marine services. 
	 Strong ability to translate market trends and customer needs intobusiness strategies. 
	 Excellent project management and coordination skills, with experience leading cross-functional teams. 
	 A proactive mindset, with the ability to navigate complex markets and drive strategic initiatives. 
	 Strong communication and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to engage customers, internal teams, and partners effectively. 
 

  What We Offer  

 
	 This role is ideal for a strategic thinker who thrives in an innovative and global environment.  
	 You will have the opportunity to shape the future of technologicalsolutions, working with a team that values collaboration, cutting-edge technology, and industry transformation. 
 

  Method of Application  
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:   hr@khenpro.com   using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.     

     

         Click here to Apply   
        

     
      

          
 
  
 
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

                         Administrative Manager Job at Zeeks Homes 



 
        
    

        
         Zeeks Homes is dedicated to serving Nigerians with real estate excellence, transforming property dreams into reality through quality, innovation, and integrity. Our focus on client satisfaction and transparent practices ensures a seamless journey, whether you're investing, buying, or seeking the perfect home. With a commitment to high standards and lasting value, Zeeks Homes delivers spaces designed for comfort, security, and growth. Our flagship project, Beacon City, is a reflection of these values, offering a secure, family-friendly environment. Experience a trusted partner in real estate with Zeeks Homes, where your property goals become our priority.
      

          
  
 
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
     
      

 

 We are recruiting to fill the position below: 
 
 Job Position: Administrative Manager  
 Job Location:  Wuse 5, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time 

  Job Description  

 
	 Are you the kind of person who brings order to chaos and who turns people into assets? 
	 We are hiring a seasoned Admin Manager who will run our internal operations, enforce structures and develop talent pipelines. 
 

  Responsibilities  

 
	 Oversee maintenance of office equipment, utilities, and premises. 
	 Manage vendor relationships for office supplies, cleaning, and security services. 
	 Implement and maintain effective administrative systems, processes, and procedures. 
	 Monitor attendance and support HR in enforcing company policies (e.g., dress code, punctuality). 
	 Support onboarding of new hires by providing administrative resources. 
	 Maintain proper documentation and filing systems (digital and physical). 
	 Manage correspondence, mail, and official communications. 
	 Assist in the preparation of tenancy agreements, sales documentation, and client correspondence. 
	 Maintain records of assets and equipment. 
 

  Job Qualification  

 
	 Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field 
	 Minimum of 2 - 5 years of experience in an administrative or office management role (real estate experience is an added advantage). 
	 Proficiency in MS Office and administrative software. 
	 Knowledge of Nigerian labor laws and real estate industry practices. 
	 Problem-solving mindset and attention to detail. 
	 Ability to manage a team and coordinate multiple departments. 
 

  Salary  
N80,000 - N100,000 / Month. 

  Method of Application  
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:   careers@zeekshomes.ng   using the Job Position as the subject of the email.     

     

         Click here to Apply   
        

     
      

          
 
  
 
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

                         Digital Marketer Job at Zeeks Homes 



 
        
    

        
         Zeeks Homes is dedicated to serving Nigerians with real estate excellence, transforming property dreams into reality through quality, innovation, and integrity. Our focus on client satisfaction and transparent practices ensures a seamless journey, whether you're investing, buying, or seeking the perfect home. With a commitment to high standards and lasting value, Zeeks Homes delivers spaces designed for comfort, security, and growth. Our flagship project, Beacon City, is a reflection of these values, offering a secure, family-friendly environment. Experience a trusted partner in real estate with Zeeks Homes, where your property goals become our priority. 

 We are recruiting to fill the position below: 

  Job Position: Digital Marketer 
      

          
  
 
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
     
      

 

  Job Location:  Wuse 5, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time 

  Job Description  

 
	 We are seeking to hire a Digital Marketer who will be responsible for developing and executing online marketing strategies to promote the company’s real estate properties and services. 
	 This role involves managing digital platforms, generating quality leads, improving online visibility, and driving engagement to support property sales and rentals. 
 

  Job Responsibilities  

 
	 Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns across social media, email, SEO, and paid ads to generate property leads. 
	 Create engaging content (videos, graphics, listings, blog posts) tailored to the real estate market and buyer personas. 
	 Ensure regular updates with current property listings, blog posts, and promotional content. 
	 Design and manage email marketing campaigns using platforms like Mailchimp or Zoho Campaigns. 
	 Monitor digital metrics (e.g., reach, engagement, conversions, click-through rates) and prepare monthly performance reports. 
	 Stay up to date with digital trends and tools to maintain a competitive edge in online property marketing. 
	 Run targeted Facebook, Instagram, Google Ads, and YouTube campaigns to promote new listings, open houses, and special offers. 
	 Optimize website and landing pages for search engines (SEO) to increase organic traffic. 
	 Manage and grow the company's social media presence (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok, Twitter). 
	 Collaborate with the sales team to ensure alignment between lead generation efforts and conversion strategy. 
	 Capture and edit photos/videos of property listings when necessary or coordinate with content creators and agencies. 
	 Ability to build Sales Funnel to generate leads 
 

  Job Qualification  

 
	 Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Communications, Digital Media, or a related field. 
	 Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience in digital marketing; real estate marketing experience is a strong advantage. 
	 Proficient in digital tools such as Meta Business Suite, Google Ads, Google Analytics, Canva, Mailchimp, and basic video editing tools. 
	 Strong understanding of social media algorithms, SEO, and online lead generation. 
	 Excellent communication, content writing, and visual storytelling skills. 
	 Self-driven, creative, and results-oriented. 
	 Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. 
 

  Salary  
N100,000 - N150,000 / Month. 

  Method of Application  
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to:   careers@zeekshomes.ng   using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.     

     

         Click here to Apply   
        

     
      

          
 
  
 
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

                         Executive Assistant Job at Zeeks Homes 



 
        
    

        
         Zeeks Homes is dedicated to serving Nigerians with real estate excellence, transforming property dreams into reality through quality, innovation, and integrity. Our focus on client satisfaction and transparent practices ensures a seamless journey, whether you're investing, buying, or seeking the perfect home. With a commitment to high standards and lasting value, Zeeks Homes delivers spaces designed for comfort, security, and growth. Our flagship project, Beacon City, is a reflection of these values, offering a secure, family-friendly environment. Experience a trusted partner in real estate with Zeeks Homes, where your property goals become our priority.
      

          
  
 
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
     
      

 

 We are recruiting to fill the position below: 
 
 Job Position: Executive Assistant  
 Job Location:  Wuse 5, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time 

  Job Description  

 
	 This isn’t just an Assistant job. It’s a front- row seat to building an empire. 
	 We are seeking a smart, high performing, fast – learning Executive Assistant who can think ahead, solve problems and move at speed of opportunity.  
	 The Executive Assistant provides high-level administrative and operational support to the Managing Director/CEO.  
	 This role ensures effective time management, smooth coordination of executive activities, and confidential handling of sensitive information. 
 

  Job Responsibilities  

 
	 Manage the MD/CEO’s calendar, schedule meetings, and coordinate appointments 
	 Handle confidential documents and maintain discretion in all executive matters. 
	 Serve as the primary point of contact between the executive and internal/external stakeholders. 
	 Screen calls, emails, and requests; respond or direct appropriately. 
	 Draft and proofread official correspondence, memos, and communications. 
	 Ensure timely follow-up on action items from meetings and communications. 
	 Coordinate cross-departmental tasks and relay key information to/from the executive. 
	 Assist in managing deadlines and monitoring project progress. 
	 Organize travel itineraries, accommodation, and logistics for the executive. 
	 Plan and coordinate corporate events, meetings, site visits, and retreats. 
	 Maintain organized digital and physical filing systems for contracts, reports, and correspondence. 
	 Track legal, regulatory, and property-related documents relevant to executive-level decision-making. 
	 Support strategic initiatives and assist in the preparation of business plans, proposals, and reports. 
	 Represent the executive in meetings or events when required. 
 

  Job Qualification  

 
	 Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Secretarial Studies, Management, or a related field. 
	 3 - 4 years of experience in a similar role, preferably in a real estate or corporate environment. 
	 Strong organizational and time-management abilities. 
	 Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook). 
	 Ability to multitask and work under pressure. 
 

  Salary  
N100,000 - N120,000 / Month. 

  Method of Application  
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:   careers@zeekshomes.ng   using the Job Position as the subject of the email.     

     

         Click here to Apply   
        

     
      

          
 
  
 
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

                         General Manager Job at Zeeks Homes 



 
        
    

        
         Zeeks Homes is dedicated to serving Nigerians with real estate excellence, transforming property dreams into reality through quality, innovation, and integrity. Our focus on client satisfaction and transparent practices ensures a seamless journey, whether you're investing, buying, or seeking the perfect home. With a commitment to high standards and lasting value, Zeeks Homes delivers spaces designed for comfort, security, and growth. Our flagship project, Beacon City, is a reflection of these values, offering a secure, family-friendly environment. Experience a trusted partner in real estate with Zeeks Homes, where your property goals become our priority. 

 We are recruiting to fill the position below: 

  Job Position: General Manager 
      

          
  
 
     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
     
      

 

  Job Location:  Wuse 5, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time 

  Job Description  

 
	 We are looking to hire a General Manager to oversee all Real Estate operations from land acquisition to Project delivery operations, and sales integration ensuring alignment with company growth goals.  
	 GM supervises departmental heads, drives growth initiatives, enforces policy compliance, and ensures effective coordination across sales, marketing, administration, finance, and project teams. 
 

  Job Responsibilities  

 
	 Develop and execute short and long-term business strategies aligned with company goals 
	 Provide leadership and direction to all departments to ensure operational efficiency and profitability. 
	 Analyse industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities to guide business decisions. 
	 Approve budgets, allocate resources, and manage cost controls across departments. 
	 Oversee marketing and property development strategies to ensure effective brand positioning 
	 Ensure all operations comply with real estate laws, regulatory requirements, and company policies. 
	 Manage company risks, contracts, and legal obligations. 
	 Ensures proper documentation, licenses, and permits for projects and property transactions. 
	 Analyse financial statements and ensure fiscal health of the business. 
 

  Job Qualification  

 
	 Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Real Estate, Management, or related field 
	 3–5 years of relevant experience, with at least 3 years in a preferably in the real estate sector 
	 Deep understanding of real estate business models, market trends, and regulations. 
	 Financial literacy and experience with budgeting and performance management. 
	 Ability to manage cross-functional teams and drive results. 
 

  Salary  
N250,000 - N350,000 / Month. 

  Method of Application  
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:   careers@zeekshomes.ng   using the Job Position as the subject of the email.     

     

         Click here to Apply
